## strip [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/dylanpiercey/strip.png)](https://travis-ci.org/dylanpiercey/strip)

Strips HTML tags.

### Install

```bash
$ npm install strip
```

### Usage

```js
strip('<p> Hello <a href="http://foo.com/?q=123">World</a> </p>');
// => Hello World
```
